column1: Uchi////You'll need a hefty line of credit to feed a family of four and not walk away hungry. Eating dinner here is ordering 8-10 TINY little appetizers at $15-20 a pop. You'll probably want to stop at Whataburger on the way home. Early reservations are a must unless you like waiting an hour. As far as the cuisine goes it's OK
column2: some items definitely better than others. Best described as nouveau millennial
